pages.about: About Gyro Glide - Leading Hoverboard Retailer in India Home About us Contacts Get Started Our Story At Gyro Glide, we're dedicated to revolutionizing personal mobility. We believe that riding a gyro scooter isn't just about getting from point A to point B; it's about embracing freedom, enjoying the thrill of the ride, and experiencing the world in a whole new way. Our Vision Gyro Glide Our vision is to transform personal transportation by providing innovative and reliable gyro scooters that enhance mobility, promote sustainability, and bring joy to our customers' lives. We strive to create a world where commuting becomes an adventure and where everyone can experience the thrill of gliding effortlessly through the streets. Reasons to Choose Us What sets Gyro Glide apart is our dedication to providing exceptional products and services. From our state-of-the-art gyro scooters to our outstanding customer support, we are committed to ensuring your satisfaction at every step of the way. Our team is passionate about delivering memorable experiences and helping you find the perfect gyro scooter to suit your needs. 1 Premium Quality: We offer cutting-edge gyro scooters crafted with precision and care to ensure superior performance and durability. 2 Exceptional Support At Gyro Glide, we are dedicated to providing outstanding customer service, offering personalized assistance and flexible solutions to meet your needs. Our Expert Team Ensuring Your Ride is Unforgettable. Lucas Smith Gyro Scooter Specialist Thiago Johnson Scooter Mechanic Gabriel White Customer Support Specialist Matheus Anderson Scooter Rental Manager Rafael Smith Marketing Strategist Gustavo Taylor Scooter Maintenance Technician Diego Martin Scooter Rental Assistant Juliana Walker Scooter Rental Coordinator Why Choose Us? Premium Quality At Gyro Glide, we are dedicated to offering premium quality gyro scooters and accessories. Each product undergoes rigorous testing and quality checks to ensure superior performance and reliability, providing you with an exceptional riding experience every time. Outstanding Customer Support We pride ourselves on delivering outstanding customer support to ensure your satisfaction. From expert advice to hassle-free warranty services, our dedicated team is here to assist you every step of the way, making your purchase experience seamless and enjoyable. Convenient Shopping Experience With our user-friendly online platform, shopping for gyro scooters has never been easier. Browse through our wide selection, make secure transactions, and enjoy swift delivery to your doorstep. Experience convenience like never before with Gyro Glide. Safety Assurance Your safety is paramount to us. That's why we meticulously inspect and certify each gyro scooter for optimal safety standards. Additionally, we provide comprehensive safety guidelines and accessories to ensure your peace of mind while enjoying your ride. Start Your Gyro Glide Choosing Gyro Glide isn't just about buying a scooter; it's about embarking on an adventure and exploring the world around you. As your companion in exploration, we provide top-quality gyro scooters and exceptional service, ensuring that every ride is memorable and enjoyable. Start Your Adventure Let's Start Gliding. pages.privacy-policy: Gyro Glide - Privacy Policy Home About us Contacts Get Started Privacy Policy Data Collection:At Gyro Glide, we collect various types of information to provide and improve our services. This may include personal information such as name, email address, shipping address, and payment details. Information Usage:We use the information collected to process orders, communicate with customers, personalize their experience, and improve our products and services. Data Security:Protecting your personal information is our priority. We implement industry-standard security measures to safeguard your data against unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. Third-Party Disclosure:We may share your information with trusted third parties, such as payment processors and shipping companies, to fulfill orders and provide services. However, we do not sell or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. Marketing Communications:By subscribing to our newsletter or providing consent, you may receive marketing communications from us via email or other channels. You can opt out of these communications at any time. Children's Privacy:Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children, and any information inadvertently collected will be deleted. Changes to Privacy Policy:We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and it is your responsibility to review the policy periodically for updates. Consent:By using our website and providing your information, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Contact Us:If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or data practices, please contact us using the information provided at gyroglide@gmail.com Data Retention:We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. International Transfers:Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your own jurisdiction, where data protection laws may differ. By using our services, you consent to such transfers. GDPR Compliance:We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and ensuring the protection of EU citizens' data rights. For more information about your rights under GDPR, please see our Privacy Policy. Information Accuracy:We strive to ensure that the information we collect and process is accurate, complete, and up-to-date. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. Effective Date:This Privacy Policy is effective and applies to all information collected and processed by Gyro Glide before or after this date. Acceptance:By continuing to use our website and services, you signify your acceptance of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this policy, please do not use our website. Opt-Out:If you no longer wish to receive marketing communications from us, you can opt out by following the instructions provided in the communication or contacting us directly. Home About us Contacts gyroglide@gmail.com +91 870 9964035 Jaipur, Rajasthan 302001, India © 2024 Gyro Glide. All Rights Reserved. Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
